mapper.select: SELECT chain.chain_id AS '门店编号', chain.chain_name AS '门店名称', chain.clerk_name AS '店主名称', chain.class_name AS '门店类型', chain.address AS '门店地址', chain.chain_phone AS '联系电话', online_rate.store_sign_discount AS '线上分销', offline_rate.store_sign_discount AS '线下分销' FROM chain LEFT JOIN ( SELECT level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.chain_id, level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.store_sign_discount FROM level_marketing_distribution_chain_site WHERE level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.chain_type = 1 ) AS online_rate ON online_rate.chain_id = chain.chain_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.chain_id, level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.store_sign_discount FROM level_marketing_distribution_chain_site WHERE level_marketing_distribution_chain_site.chain_type = 2 ) AS offline_rate ON offline_rate.chain_id = chain.chain_id

SELECT chain.chain_name AS '门店名称', x.日期 AS '日期', SUM(x.销售额) AS '销售额', SUM(x.订单数) AS '订单数', SUM(x.新增会员) AS '新增会员', SUM(x.美豆使用数) AS '美豆使用数' FROM chain LEFT JOIN ( ( SELECT chain_orders.chain_id, DATE_FORMAT(chain_orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '日期', SUM(chain_orders.orders_amount + chain_orders.points_money_amount) AS '销售额', COUNT(DISTINCT chain_orders.orders_id) AS '订单数', 0 AS '新增会员', SUM(chain_orders.points_money_amount) AS '美豆使用数' FROM chain_orders WHERE chain_orders.orders_state = 40 GROUP BY chain_orders.chain_id, DATE_FORMAT(chain_orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) UNION ALL ( SELECT chain_member.chain_id, DATE_FORMAT(chain_member.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '日期', 0 AS '销售额', 0 AS '订单数', COUNT(DISTINCT chain_member.member_id) AS '新增会员', 0 AS '美豆使用数' FROM chain_member GROUP BY chain_member.chain_id, DATE_FORMAT(chain_member.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) ) AS x ON x.chain_id = chain.chain_id WHERE TRUE -- AND chain.chain_name LIKE '%一树%'
AND (x.日期 = #{日期})
AND chain.chain_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{门店名称},'%')
GROUP BY x.chain_id, x.日期 ORDER BY x.chain_id, x.日期 DESC

SELECT x.`时间/每天` AS '时间/每天', SUM(x.`销售额`) AS '销售额', SUM(x.`订单数`) AS '订单数', SUM(x.`新增会员`) AS '新增会员', SUM(x.`美豆使用数`) AS '美豆使用数', SUM(x.`积美豆数`) AS '积美豆数', SUM(x.`美豆使用人数`) AS '美豆使用人数', SUM(x.`赠送美豆人数`) AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(chain_orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '时间/每天', SUM(chain_orders.orders_amount + chain_orders.points_money_amount) AS '销售额', COUNT(DISTINCT chain_orders.orders_id) AS '订单数', 0 AS '新增会员', 0 AS '美豆使用数', 0 AS '积美豆数', 0 AS '美豆使用人数', 0 AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM chain_orders WHERE chain_orders.orders_state = 40 -- 订单完成 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(chain_orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '时间/每天', SUM(orders.orders_amount + orders.points_money_amount) AS '销售额', COUNT(DISTINCT orders.orders_id) AS '订单数', 0 AS '新增会员', 0 AS '美豆使用数', 0 AS '积美豆数', 0 AS '美豆使用人数', 0 AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM orders WHERE orders.orders_state = 40 -- 订单完成 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(orders.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(member.register_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '时间/每天', 0 AS '销售额', 0 AS '订单数', COUNT(DISTINCT member.member_id) AS '新增会员', 0 AS '美豆使用数', 0 AS '积美豆数', 0 AS '美豆使用人数', 0 AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM member GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(member.register_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(points_log.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '时间/每天', 0 AS '销售额', 0 AS '订单数', 0 AS '新增会员', SUM(points_log.points) AS '美豆使用数', 0 AS '积美豆数', COUNT(DISTINCT points_log.member_id) AS '美豆使用人数', 0 AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM points_log WHERE points_log.points < 0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(points_log.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(points_log.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS '时间/每天', 0 AS '销售额', 0 AS '订单数', 0 AS '新增会员', 0 AS '美豆使用数', SUM(points_log.points) AS '积美豆数', 0 AS '美豆使用人数', COUNT(DISTINCT points_log.member_id) AS '赠送美豆人数' FROM points_log WHERE points_log.points > 0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(points_log.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS x WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY x.`时间/每天` order by x.`时间/每天` desc
